xml.title: Mobile Outlaw Daily Dashboard
xml.description:
This report provides daily stats for outlaw. The daily stats are as follows:
o DAU o Installs o MAU o Engagement o D1, D7, D30 Retention o Revenue o Game Activity and Sessions
The report shows day on day (DoD) and week on week (WoW) % changes as well as 30 day trends.
NOTE: FTUE and Gun purchase/upgrade trends reflect install cohorts of the last 7 days. NOTE: MAU is calculated from logged events and may reflect true monthly users. NOTE: Revenue is gross. NOTE: Retention is based on users who have created a game event so is likely over inflated. NOTE: A 10% sample is used to track events.
xml.query: select 'DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='dau' group by 1 union select 'Installs' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='installs' group by 1 union select 'Sessions/DAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),2) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='sessions' and game_id=-2 group by 1 union select 'Med Session Length' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='sessionlen' and game_id=-2 group by 1 union select 'MAU' as Metric, format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),0) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='mau' group by 1 union select 'Revenue' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),2)) as Value, concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*sum(case when stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric='revenue' group by 1 union select 'Revenue/DAU' as Metric, concat('$',format(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end),3)) as Value, concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 1 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'DoD % Change', concat(format(100*(sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date='$date$' then value else 0 end))/ (sum(case when metric='revenue' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end)/ sum(case when metric='dau' and stat_date=date_sub('$date$', interval 7 day) then value else 0 end))-100,2),'%') as 'WoW % Change' from tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash where metric in('revenue','dau') group by 1 order by 1 ;

# FTUE create table tmp.ftue_outlaw_daily_dash(index(user_id, event_id)) as select a.user_id, a.event_id, a.stat_date, a.stat_time from tmp.events_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.installs_outlaw_daily_dash b, tmp.l_event_outlaw_daily_dash c where a.user_id=b.user_id and a.event_id=c.event_id and c.type='FTUE' and b.install_date between date_sub('$date$',interval $ndays$ day) and '$date$' group by 1,2,3,4 ;
select install_date as 'Install Date', count(distinct user_id) as Installs, 100*sum(FT01_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT01_Started, 100*sum(FT01_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT01_Completed, 100*sum(FT02_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT02_Started, 100*sum(FT02_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT02_Completed, 100*sum(FT03_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT03_Started, 100*sum(FT03_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT03_Completed, 100*sum(FT04_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT04_Started, 100*sum(FT04_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT04_Completed, 100*sum(FT05_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT05_Started, 100*sum(FT05_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT05_Completed, 100*sum(FT06_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT06_Started, 100*sum(FT06_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT06_Completed, 100*sum(FT07_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT07_Started, 100*sum(FT07_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT07_Completed, 100*sum(FT08_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT08_Started, 100*sum(FT08_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT08_Completed, 100*sum(FT09_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT09_Started, 100*sum(FT09_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT09_Completed, 100*sum(FT10_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT10_Started, 100*sum(FT10_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT10_Completed, 100*sum(FT11_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT11_Started, 100*sum(FT11_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT11_Completed, 100*sum(FT12_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT12_Started, 100*sum(FT12_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT12_Completed, 100*sum(FT13_Started)/count(distinct user_id) as FT13_Started, 100*sum(FT13_Completed)/count(distinct user_id) as FT13_Completed from ( select a.install_date, a.user_id, 10*max(case when event_id=75 then 1 else 0 end) as FT01_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=76 then 1 else 0 end) as FT01_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=78 then 1 else 0 end) as FT02_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=77 then 1 else 0 end) as FT02_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=80 then 1 else 0 end) as FT03_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=79 then 1 else 0 end) as FT03_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=82 then 1 else 0 end) as FT04_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=81 then 1 else 0 end) as FT04_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=84 then 1 else 0 end) as FT05_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=83 then 1 else 0 end) as FT05_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=85 then 1 else 0 end) as FT06_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=87 then 1 else 0 end) as FT06_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=88 then 1 else 0 end) as FT07_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=89 then 1 else 0 end) as FT07_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=93 then 1 else 0 end) as FT08_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=94 then 1 else 0 end) as FT08_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=161 then 1 else 0 end) as FT09_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=162 then 1 else 0 end) as FT09_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=95 then 1 else 0 end) as FT10_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=96 then 1 else 0 end) as FT10_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=98 then 1 else 0 end) as FT11_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=101 then 1 else 0 end) as FT11_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=103 then 1 else 0 end) as FT12_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=104 then 1 else 0 end) as FT12_Completed, 10*max(case when event_id=105 then 1 else 0 end) as FT13_Started, 10*max(case when event_id=106 then 1 else 0 end) as FT13_Completed from tmp.installs_outlaw_daily_dash a left join tmp.ftue_outlaw_daily_dash b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.install_date between date_sub('$date$',interval $ndays$ day) and '$date$' group by 1,2 ) a group by 1 order by 1 ;

# Weapon Purchases create table tmp.gunpurchase_outlaw_daily_dash as select a.user_id, c.install_date, a.stat_date, a.stat_time, event_name, substring_index(substring_index(event_name,"_",4),"_",-1) as gun, substring_index(substring_index(event_name,"_",5),"_",-1) as location from tmp.events_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.l_event_outlaw_daily_dash b, tmp.installs_outlaw_daily_dash c where a.event_id=b.event_id and a.user_id=c.user_id and b.type ='PRCD' and c.install_date between date_sub('$date$', interval $ndays$ day) and '$date$' group by 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 ;
select install_date as "Install Date", max(i.value) as Installs, 10*count(distinct case when gun='musket' then user_id else null end) as Musket, 10*count(distinct case when gun='cannonpistol' then user_id else null end) as CannonPistol, 10*count(distinct case when gun='shotgun' then user_id else null end) as PepperBox, 10*count(distinct case when gun='tarballgun' then user_id else null end) as TarBallGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='rifle' then user_id else null end) as Rifle, 10*count(distinct case when gun='buzzsawyer' then user_id else null end) as BuzzSawyer, 10*count(distinct case when gun='carbine' then user_id else null end) as Carbine, 10*count(distinct case when gun='oldsmokey' then user_id else null end) as OldSmokey, 10*count(distinct case when gun='shortcarbine' then user_id else null end) as ShortCarbine, 10*count(distinct case when gun='dynogun' then user_id else null end) as DynOGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='buffalogun' then user_id else null end) as BuffaloGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='applejack' then user_id else null end) as AppleJack, 10*count(distinct case when gun='lilTimmy' then user_id else null end) as LilTimmy, 10*count(distinct case when gun='mortarmusket' then user_id else null end) as MortarMusket, 10*count(distinct case when gun='bulldoggatlin' then user_id else null end) as BullDogGatlin, 10*count(distinct case when gun='teslalightning' then user_id else null end) as TeslaLightning from tmp.gunpurchase_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash i where a.install_date=i.stat_date and i.metric='installs' group by 1 order by 1 desc ;

create table tmp.gunupgrade_outlaw_daily_dash as select a.user_id, c.install_date, stat_date, stat_time, event_name, substring_index(substring_index(event_name,"_",4),"_",-1) as gun, substring_index(substring_index(event_name,"_",5),"_",-1) as location, substring_index(event_name,"_",-1) as upgrade from tmp.events_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.l_event_outlaw_daily_dash b, tmp.installs_outlaw_daily_dash c where a.event_id=b.event_id and a.user_id=c.user_id and b.type ='UPGD' and c.install_date between date_sub('$date$', interval $ndays$ day) and '$date$' group by 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 ;
select install_date as "Install Date", max(i.value) as Installs, 10*count(distinct case when gun='musket' then user_id else null end) as Musket, 10*count(distinct case when gun='cannonpistol' then user_id else null end) as CannonPistol, 10*count(distinct case when gun='shotgun' then user_id else null end) as PepperBox, 10*count(distinct case when gun='tarballgun' then user_id else null end) as TarBallGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='rifle' then user_id else null end) as Rifle, 10*count(distinct case when gun='buzzsawyer' then user_id else null end) as BuzzSawyer, 10*count(distinct case when gun='carbine' then user_id else null end) as Carbine, 10*count(distinct case when gun='oldsmokey' then user_id else null end) as OldSmokey, 10*count(distinct case when gun='shortcarbine' then user_id else null end) as ShortCarbine, 10*count(distinct case when gun='dynogun' then user_id else null end) as DynOGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='buffalogun' then user_id else null end) as BuffaloGun, 10*count(distinct case when gun='applejack' then user_id else null end) as AppleJack, 10*count(distinct case when gun='lilTimmy' then user_id else null end) as LilTimmy, 10*count(distinct case when gun='mortarmusket' then user_id else null end) as MortarMusket, 10*count(distinct case when gun='bulldoggatlin' then user_id else null end) as BullDogGatlin, 10*count(distinct case when gun='teslalightning' then user_id else null end) as TeslaLightning from tmp.gunupgrade_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash i where a.install_date=i.stat_date and i.metric='installs' group by 1 order by 1 desc ;

select install_date as "Install Date", max(i.value) as Installs, 10*count(distinct case when upgrade=lower('attachment') then user_id else null end) as Attachment, 10*count(distinct case when upgrade=lower('barrel') then user_id else null end) as Barrel, 10*count(distinct case when upgrade=lower('cartridge') then user_id else null end) as Cartridge, 10*count(distinct case when upgrade=lower('sight') then user_id else null end) as Sight, 10*count(distinct case when upgrade=lower('stock') then user_id else null end) as Stock from tmp.gunupgrade_outlaw_daily_dash a, tmp.a_metrics_outlaw_daily_dash i where a.install_date=i.stat_date and i.metric='installs' group by 1 order by 1 desc ;
